step_feedback.feedback: Your arm was mostly straight overhead, but the elbow and wrist had some movement. Try to keep your arm fully extended and feel that gentle resistance.
Your arm was mostly overhead, but the elbow and wrist showed some deviation. Focus on maintaining a straight arm and a firm fist as you inhale.
Your arm was mostly overhead, but the elbow and wrist had some movement. Remember to open your hand wide and relax as you exhale.
Your arm was mostly overhead, but the elbow and wrist showed some deviation. Keep your hand open and relaxed as you exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a good job stretching your arm overhead and making a fist. Try to keep your arm straighter and your hand movements more controlled during the exercise.
